TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EventsTab extends System.Windows.Forms.Design.PropertyTab

Docs.summary: Provides a that can display events for selection and linking.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following code example provides an example <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.EventsTab>. When selected, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.EventsTab> lists any events on a component in order of delegate type.
[!code-cpp[EventsTabExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/EventsTabExample/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[EventsTabExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/EventsTabExample/CS/class1.cs#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks The event tab properties are determined from the event properties returned from a component's event service.
